answers.answer: With my last pregnancy I gained like 25 lbs or so and my hubby told me I needed to watch what I ate. And I said you need to watch your f*cking mouth! :)
Hahahahah ash !! My hubby makes me eat more and im like stoppp im getting bigger and he is like , as long as u prego baby thats fine !!! Lmao
Lol my bf is the same. Silly men
Yea... my fiance told me I looked like I was gaining all my baby weight in my butt and my "muffin top"... lol guys should sometimes just not speak.

Well I wasn't even big I gained 25 lbs but it wads all appropriate and you couldn't tell I was prego unless I was turned to the side! He's just a rude a.s.s. the whole time I was pregnant he was like turned on by my pregnant body but he's just a dbag and likes to f with me. I was like no sir, sit down.
My bf told to go to the cause I was gaining to much weight.
My bf told to go to the cause I was gaining to much weight.

Oh wow id knock my man or doctor out if they said any of those things my man said the same thing vivi2013 im like you dont actually have to eat for 2 and his like my little man/girl needs to be fed properly aslong as you tighten your stomach back up after you give birth and dont have a apron which i totally understand and he tells me im beautiful and writes me letters and stuff (we live together) saying how happy he was that im carrying our first child his abit cute but i still get moody over some tiny thing and wanna smash him lol

My doctor told me the same thing, said I needed to go on a diet it was rude, I ignored him. I've gained 50lbs now! But I gained 50 last pregnancy too! And lost it so I wasn't worried. were you tall and skinny?
Yeah my dr told me that too but now my weight gaining is fine. I'm almost 37 weeks and have gained 37lbs lol

That's crazy, I gained 50 lbs with my first pregnancy and the doctors never said anything about it... But this time around I've lost about 20 lbs and I'm only 18 weeks so they're getting on my nerves about that... Lol

I went from 145 to 180!!! And I'm only 28weeks.......yikes. But I only see it in my butt, thighs and belly. Doctor hasn't told me anything except for to keep as active as I can. I have always been thick, but fit. I personally don't like the weight I have put on but I am still working out and trying to stay active. Looking forward to getting back down to the 140s after baby gets here.

I hear ya. Throughout my first pregnancy the docs were always getting mad that i wasn't gaining any weight. Then at 32weeks i started gaining large amounts of weight. By the time i had my son at 35weeks i gained a total of 72lbs. They then starting getting mad at how much i gained. I was so mad. Just make up your mind. I ended up having preeclampsia so that's where the weight came from. All water weight. But i still couldn't believe that they were whining that i wasn't gaining weight then turned around and started whining that i gained too much weight.

Its just annoying sometimes I eat not a lot an I still gain I'm sick of hearing all of it... have a baby then talk I'm just sick of the doctors offics in general. I am still tall and skinny I'm all boobs and bellly so seriously like 10 lbs is in my boobs but I'm gonna ignore it bc I'm almost 7 months I gained 33 lbs like jeeze crucify me
Lol aw I haven't gained any weight yet and my bf is always telling me to eat

question: The doctors are telling me that I need to slow down on my eating and walk more but I swear to god every time I walk I get that shooting pain in my nerve which I have to sit and rest I get back up and it comes back. Wicked annoying they say they knoe but I know my body and id prefer not to faint every time I shop or walk
title: so annoying
